note.p: Ethnic German schoolteacher. Born and lived in that part of the Austro-Hungarian empire which is now Romania. Taught at the Evangelical Gymnasium, Hermannstadt (now Sibiu, Romania), 1866–1905. Director of the Gremialhandelsschule, 1883–1919; of the Gewerbeschule, 1892–1920. Secretary of the Siebenbürgische Verein für Naturwissenschaften, 1870–81.
